biotools.summary: CCancer is an automatically collected database of gene lists reported in various studies. The current coverage is 3369 gene lists from 2644 papers. Enrichment analysis reports intersecting gene lists with an inputted gene list.

bioschemas.name: CCancer
bioschemas.summary: CCancer is an automatically collected database of gene lists reported in various studies. The current coverage is 3369 gene lists from 2644 papers. Enrichment analysis reports intersecting gene lists with an inputted gene list.
